There is no height limit

There are large spaces for trucks or buses in case you go with a large motorhome

Mercadona less than 5min and laundry less than 7

title_short: (08520) AREA DE PERNOCTA  - CERRADO POR REFORMAS
description:
ATTENTION: Closed for renovations as of may 7, 2023
Very well connected area, easily accessible with comfortable and spacious pitches. Cleaning area, emptying gray water and chemical toilet, charging drinking water and electricity. Maximum stay 24 hours. 20 seats. € 10 night. Attention during office hours: 9:30 AM to 1:30 PM / 4:00 PM at 8:30 PM. Bus stop at 500m. Mechanical motorhome workshop at 500m. Restaurants, cinemas and shops within 3 km In this area are allowed: motorhomes, motorhomes and prepared vans.
WhatsApp reservations

title_short: (08430) La Roca del Vallès - 12R Carrer Sector Santa Agnès
description: Very quiet parking lot in a residential area. There are also a number of parking spaces in the side streets. We spent the night here and felt very safe. Our motorhome of 6m fit into the parking space without any problems.

name: Montseny Campers' Association (AAM)
title: (08458) Montseny Campers' Association (AAM)
description:
ONLY BOOKINGS 1 HOUR IN ADVANCE. Entry is not possible or permitted without a reservation. ⚠️ Contact via email or WhatsApp recommended. Telephone also possible. Albert replies quickly!

The contribution is 100% intended for the conservation of the flora and fauna of the site and for the promotion of the natural environment in which you are staying, the "Biosphere Reserve of Montseny".

Services: All services are very good and well maintained.

Security: The site is under video surveillance and can only be accessed via an entrance gate with a code. (Albert knows you're there before you set up your camper.)

Registration: You ask for the desired period. Then you get all the information, e.g. via WhatsApp. Then he only needs the information about which vehicle you are driving (easiest: a picture of the vehicle with a recognizable license plate via WhatsApp).

BE SURE TO USE GPS COORDINATES!
Thanks very much!

title: (08450) Llinars del Vallès - 90 Diseminado Diseminados
description: We spent two days very well and calm. They are the facilities of the Mogent colony house and they are very good. There is drinking water, showers, toilets, a small playground for the children and picnic tables. They can also access motorhomes. Children under 13 years old do not pay. From the 3rd person over 12 years old, they pay. Very friendly owners. They told us that soon they want to put gray and black water drainage, at the moment they do not have. For the electricity you pay separately. To go you have to book. They have WhatsApp. Since June 2021 they already have for gray and black water!

title: (08445) Cànoves - 6 Avinguda Josep Crous
description:
Forbidden for motorhomes from 00h until 07h.

Large parking lot to visit the town, with good restaurants, bakery farm of 10, little shops and pizzeria opposite. Next to it, a very cool children's park, a sports track and a great skate park for children. Very cool fountain below the parking lot. From the right side of the town square, the route to the Vallforners reservoir starts along the stupendous stream, passing through bridges and wooden walkways, where you can get soaked along the way. The bad thing is that there is not much shade in summer in this car park. A site 10. There are no emptying services or water.

name: Área de Autocaravanas Granollers
title: (08401) Área de Autocaravanas Granollers
description: Motorhome area with 13 parking spaces DO NOT PUT BLACK WATER IN THE DRINKING WATER SUPPLY! It has a different place for that, right next to where organic matter is concerned. Maximum 4 days, bottle area every day. Big freeway next to heavy traffic all day

title: (08530) La Garriga - 82 Carrer Can Basal
description: It consists of an open field, practically in the center of the town of La Garriga ... Nearby there are parks for children, a gas station, bike path, paths towards the mountain, ... If you walk about 500 meters you will reach the center of the town, where it is always very lively ... there are shops of all kinds and bars / restaurants. In summer, at the end of July / beginning of August it is usually the biggest party, and the parties are just held in this field, just in case, if it falls in those times consult the website of the town hall.

title: (08530) L'Ametlla del Vallès - Unnamed Road
description:
Nice quiet spot to park during the day or spend the night. Very few locals people pass by on the next morning. No services. Close to l'atmella village, you can slightly hear the highway.
The access is through a dusty road that doesn't appear in google maps as a road. Easy access even for big vans.

It is suitable for people with disabilities.

title: (08317) Òrrius - 26 Carrer Barcelona

title: () Valldoriolf -
description:
Are you looking for a safe and quiet place near Barcelona? Here you can spend the night because you don't need much to travel!

IMPORTANT: During this summer, since there are not many shady areas, it is better to avoid being there between 11 in the morning and 8 in the afternoon.

To contact do it only via whatsapp, telegram, signal or email. Not calls. Thank you. Riki.

There is a bus stop (400) 1.5 km away that goes directly to BCN. It takes 30 minutes and costs €4.5/person.

The Montmeló circuit is 3km away. You can walk safely.

title: (08460) Santa Maria de Palautordera - 26 Carrer Antonio Gaudi

description: Municipal parking to arrive at the circ cric (250m). Com a minimum, in ten d'espectacle, cap problem fer-hi nit.

title: (08410) Vilanova del Vallès - BV-5159
description:
Hello! We are the Pedrón de Sande family (Eli, Alfred and Pau who is 4 and a half years old, also "Suro" a super good and sociable puppy and Lluna a 7 month old border colie puppy).
We live in the middle of cultivated fields and forests. Our life system is slowlife and we would love to receive you on our land.
The location is surrounded by fields and forest. There are no industrial noises and very few cars pass through the area.
The land we offer is flat with short grass, access is super easy.
There is no hot water but you have several outlets outside.
You have available the WiFi of the house with a good connection.
Regarding rules, we want to promote common sense: use electricity conscientiously, garbage collection, collection of
animal droppings, respect the rest of the family that lives in the house.
Always welcome! Greetings.

title: (08304) Mataró - 30 Carrer del Cami de la Cornisa
title_short: (08304) Mataró - 30 Carrer del Cami de la Cornisa
description: Ascent to a parking lot with exceptional views of the city of Mataró and the port, suitable for all vehicles. Maximum length 8m. About 20 places to park. There are rubbish bins, tables and some route through the area.

address.street: 30 Carrer del Cami de la Cornisa

title: (08310) Argentona - 5 Ronda Ponent
description: Quiet street in the upper part of the city, where you can park and sleep peacefully. Good visits Argentona and the mountain. Zone for dogs right in front. A very calm

title: (08319) Dosrius - Veinat del Far
description: Sanctuary located in full nature, in the heart of the "Parc Natural Corredor-Montnegre". It is accessed by a forest track in good condition and has ample parking. The restaurant is open on weekends all year and in summer every day. The month of July closed for holidays. Ideal for VAN's and small vehicle.

title: (08304) Mataró - 17 Carrer Riu Ebre
description: Parking under the viewpoint of the Mataró forest park. The viewpoint has better views but it is very crowded and this parking lot is much quieter and has 2 levels. no parking from 10pm to 7am. Then in the morning you can go up to see the viewpoint and there are tables for breakfast with good views.

title: (08186) Lliçà d'Amunt - 2 Carretera Granollers
description: City center car park with nearby restaurant and trade. no barrier Ok for big guys. at the end of the car park small path at the end of a quiet corner ....

title: (08471) Vallgorguina - Unnamed Road
description: Small parking in the nature reserve. Very quiet and secluded. In a few steps you are at a stone platform, from which you can wonderfully watch the sunset. The road is not fixed. With our van no problem, but I do not know if it is suitable for larger campers.

title: (08403) Granollers - 49 Carretera Nacional 152
description: Moto gp parking

title: (08317) Òrrius - Carretera Cabrils a Òrrius

description: Self-service laundry with good area to park large vehicles

title: (08348) Cabrils - Unnamed Road
description: Cool spot for transit. Slept there to visit Barcelona. In between, a group of mountain bikers came by, nothing else. --> Tip to visit Barcelona, park in Badalona at the train station and take the train/metro to Barcelona worked great.

title: (08310) Argentona - 39 Urbanització Can Serra de Lladó
title_short: (08310) Argentona - 39 Urbanització Can Serra de Lladó
description: Parking area next to the road. Not very busy. Quiet to spend a night if it catches you en route.

title: (08410) Vilanova del Vallès - 2 Carrer Noruega
description: MODIFICATION: not suitable for motorhomes. Due to the absence of signage throughout the municipality and following a comment, I have reviewed the municipal ordinance and it indicates that motorhomes can only park next to the cultural center and the parking lot next to the town hall. Vans or vehicles approved as residential vehicles are not considered in the ordinance, so they can park here. Beautiful place in the middle of the forest, secluded and quiet. It is reached by a dirt track in good condition from the school road. The place is on the right hand side going down the road. There are other flat spaces to park on the same path a few meters before this location. ATTENTION! Be careful with Google Maps, if you put this location it can take you to another place or by another path. The only viable access is from the school. Mark the school as the destination to arrive correctly. Then take the dirt road going straight. No services but good coverage. Let's keep the place clean for everyone to enjoy.

title: (08410) Vilanova del Vallès - 51 Passeig del Centenari
title_short: (08410) Vilanova del Vallès - 51 Passeig del Centenari
description: Paved parking next to the town hall. Green areas around. Easy access and shops nearby. Motorhomes can only park here or in the parking lot of the cultural center according to the municipal ordinance. Vehicles over 3,500 kg cannot park from 8:00 p.m. to 8:00 a.m.

title: (08590) Figaró-Montmany - 10 Carrer Ramir Delgado
description: Spring source, fresh and pure, good access at the foot of the source with a well paved road

title: (08410) Vilanova del Vallès - 49 Passeig del Centenari
title_short: (08410) Vilanova del Vallès - 49 Passeig del Centenari
description: Parking of the cultural center. Easy access, close to shops. According to the municipal ordinance, motorhomes can only park here or in the parking lot next to the town hall.

name: Aparcamiento Supermercado Bonpreu
title: (08410) Aparcamiento Supermercado Bonpreu
description: Car park 2 minutes from the A7 exit in Granollers, ideal for refueling and spending the night in a quiet village without crime. Next to the BonPreu supermarket and gas station, which also has Adblue. The supermarket is also open on Sunday morning and in the center of town next to the health center and the Town Hall on Sunday morning there is a vegetable market.

title: (08339) Vilassar de Dalt - Unnamed Road
description: Old shooting range. No access without 4x4. No chance to get out in rainy weather. Very remote.

title_short: (08187) Santa Eulàlia de Ronçana - 2 Carrer Joan I

description: Level ground parking. Route of ascent to the castle of Burriac. Without services there is a bar nearby. Climbing area nearby.

title: (08590) Figaró-Montmany - BV-1489
description: Full of nature, with views of the mountains. Roads with difficult access and low trees. ONLY FOR SMALL CAMPERS. No services

title: (08349) Cabrera de Mar - 4 Cami Font Picant
title_short: (08349) Cabrera de Mar - 4 Cami Font Picant
description: Flat parking lot in the forest with enough space for a few vans. A somewhat steep and bumpy driveway but only short and not as bad as others in the area. Spent one night here. It's a chain at the entrance. However, currently open. The road can be heard, but in the distance. We couldn't find a more suitable place nearby, unless there's supposed to be one right next to it.

title: (08590) Figaró-Montmany - BV-1489

title: (08348) Cabrils - 4 Avinguda Zona Esportiva

title: (08471) Vallgorguina - 72 Carretera Mataro
description: Free parking at the exit of the town of Vallgorguina. 5 seats. Water source. Picnic table. Next to the municipal soccer field. 100m from a calesthenics area. 300m from a spectacular trial area. 200m from a children's area. 100m from the health center. From there there is a 7km excursion to the dolmen.

title: (08470) San Celoni - 282 Carrer Comerc
description: New 7-seater motorhome area. Next door there is more parking. There is enough to empty the gray water and you can load water. All services in less than 5 minutes, the train station to go to Barcelona (45 km), 2 minutes to the center of Sant Celoni, petrol stations, supermarkets. The train line Barcelona-Girona is right next door, some goods can circulate at night. 100x100 recommended.

title: (08471) Vallgorguina - 20 Carretera Mataro
description: Free public parking in the same town but without streets, only the access one, surrounded by nature, with shops, bars and others at 100 m. Super quiet, ideal for excursions. The small population but with services.

title: (08470) San Celoni - 109 E-15
description: Parking defined as such next to the highway. The rest is green and next to the mountain. Little protected from the wind and calm. Starting point of several mountain routes. Easy access.

title: (08160) Montmeló - 8 Polígon Pol17 el Pedregar Indu
title_short: (08160) Montmeló - 8 Polígon Pol17 el Pedregar Indu
description:
We spent one night in the area. There is noise from the road but there is enough space to park.
We were several campers there.

title_short: (08150) Parets del Vallès - 18 Carrer de Víctor Català

title: (08472) Campins -
description: Parking of the school of Campins. Nice and quiet place surrounded by trees and an illuminated park. Without electricity or services.

title: (08348) Cabrils - 6 Passeig de Cabrils
description: Next to the gas station. They park motorhomes. At the entrance it is flatter and towards the bottom it is incline. Perfect for visiting the town because it is next door.

title: (08470) -
description: Quiet place despite the rails which are quite close, but at night there is little passage of trains. A few walkers during the day, surrounded by fields and forest therefore for ideal hiking departures. Recommended for one night, but no more. Little more, the place is easily accessible by motorhome and above all it is flat.

title_short: (08479) La Costa de Montseny - 152 Carretera de las Costas

title_short: (08150) Parets del Vallès - 10 Avinguda de Francesc Macià

title_short: (08150) Parets del Vallès - 186 Avinguda de Catalunya

So it's just a little louder. Otherwise we had a quiet night and we were not disturbed in the morning either, despite many cars and an event in the building.

title: (08415) Bigues i Riells - 98 Carrer d' Anna Mogas
title_short: (08415) Bigues i Riells - 98 Carrer d' Anna Mogas
description: Parking without services. Very quiet at night. It is located in a dead end so there is very little passage. There is a small supermarket nearby.

title: (08160) Montmeló - 7 Vial Congost
description: Parking for mobile homes in the area immediately to the right of the entrance to the recycling center. Warning: deactivate the pop-up blocker beforehand, otherwise the payment page will be blocked! About 25 minutes from Barcelona, emptying of gray and black water. Large car park, neighborhood playground with basketball and football. With the S/U Bahn you can easily get to Barcelona. Stop p, gracia is centrally located. S/u bahn station montmelo about 10 minutes walk from the square.

name: Camping Les Piscines de Montseny
title: (08469) Camping Les Piscines de Montseny
description: A wonderful place in the middle of a natural setting. Breathing clean air in times of pandemic is a luxury. Campsite with a water pool that runs directly from the River. With access to the river and a picnic area with barbecues. Very shady areas. We will repeat for sure. It is not the cheapest but it is worth it.

title: (08170) Montornès del Vallès - 5 Avinguda de l'Onze de Setembre
title_short: (08170) Montornès del Vallès - 5 Avinguda de l'Onze de Setembre
description: LAVARAPID Open 365 days a year from 8am. at 10 p.m. 18 kg washing machines. Automatic payment machine. Accepts bills and coins

title: (08349) Cabrera de Mar - 100 Camí del Mig
title_short: (08349) Cabrera de Mar - 100 Camí del Mig
description: Plenty of parking in front of the shops in the commercial area of Cabrera de mar, we parked one night with a 7m long camper. Quiet area, in the distance the music of a disco and a few passing cars.

title: (08302) Mataró - 80 Carrer Pablo Iglesias
description: Tree-lined street with shade and many parking spaces, some completely flat. It is located next to the soccer field near the Mossos de Escuadra police station and at the end of the Can Boada polygon. A few meters away we find the Roman site of Torre Llaurader. It is a quiet area with many trees and parks to walk the dog. It is close to the residential area with supermarkets, bars, etc, and about 500m from the beach. At night there is always parking. I don't recommend weekends because they come to have a bottle.

title: (08470) Sant Celoni - Plaça Sector Cementeri
description: Shared parking at the LIDL supermarket and Burguer King. There is also a furniture and household goods store. Large, bright, there is WIFI in the Burger King. You can park day and night

title: (08469) Montseny - 8 Carrer de la Font del Gatell
title_short: (08469) Montseny - 8 Carrer de la Font del Gatell
description: Parking area next to the town and next to the road. There is hardly any traffic at night. Beautiful views of Montseny. Very quiet night.

address.street: 8 Carrer de la Font del Gatell

title: (08301) Mataró - Av. del Maresme
description: Parking along the railway line opposite the nautical center, possibility of spending the night without problem, no prohibition sign. On the other hand noisy by the passage of the trains. Access to the beach at 50m. Nice city to stay there for 1 day.

title: (08302) Mataró - 100 Passeig del Callao
description: Drinking water fountain 5m from the car park between the road and Mataró beach. Perfect for filling jerry cans. Easy access for a van or a motorhome if there is room.

title: (08339) Vilassar de Dalt - 25 Carrer Rafel Riera i Prats
title_short: (08339) Vilassar de Dalt - 25 Carrer Rafel Riera i Prats
description: Laundry room to wash clothes. Various capacities with drying option.

title: (08469) Montseny -
description: Quiet place surrounded by nature next to the river. You can bathe in the river and at night you can see the stars. We don't know if it's legal to park here, but they haven't told us anything ...

title: (08160) Montmeló - 6 Passeig de les Corts Catalanes
title_short: (08160) Montmeló - 6 Passeig de les Corts Catalanes
description: LAUNDRY The value for money in this laundromat is really very good. 2 euros for 20 minutes dryer is really great!?? All (2 washing machines at 10 kg / 1 WM at 12 kg 1 WM at 16 kg / 2 dryers at 18 kg) are paid directly at the machine. It only works with 1 EUR coins. There is a machine on the wall that changes bills. Detergent is included. You cannot add your own detergent. But it smells moderate. Not too strong.

title: (08469) Montseny - Unnamed road
description: Parking indicated direction Matagalls to the sports area. Terra de gravel and level asphalt with fans and trees. Spectaculars you dress Montseny. Apartat from the main road, very quiet.

name: Les Feixes del Vilar | Àrea d’esplai
title: (08479) Les Feixes del Vilar | Àrea d’esplai
title_short: (08479) Les Feixes del Vilar | Àrea d’esplai
description: Picnic area with fountain and toilets. There is a parking lot just at the entrance where 5 or 6 cars can fit. There is no "no parking" sign yet. There is also a bus station line 571-572, Sagalés company. Ideal to spend the whole day!

title: (08302) Mataró - 129 Avinguda del Maresme
description: Parking during the day, you cannot spend the night. Only 100 meters away there is a sandy beach for people and another small fenced beach for dogs. The first hour is free (2 hours in winter). Until you get there, you pass the train tracks through a 5 meter high tunnel. To walk into the city, you have to take the underground next to the station (beautiful old building in red) under the trains.

title: (08302) Mataró - Passeig de Marina
description: Parking possible along the sidewalks on either side of the street where, alone, the railway line separates us from the sea. Many trains during the day but not at night. Had a quiet night. The police passed last night without stopping.

title: (08339) Vilassar de Dalt - 12 Carrer Ignasi de Bufalà
title_short: (08339) Vilassar de Dalt - 12 Carrer Ignasi de Bufalà
description: Public parking with a pine forest, quiet, with shadows, with public transport, a pizzeria nearby, a "rostisseria" (there are cheap chicken menus at the ast) ... we spent one night it was the festivities of the village at the end of August ... we ran away from the noise of the beach, train and cars, here we slept very well ... recommended the place and the city at parties ...

title: (08302) Mataró - 185 Passeig de Marina
description:
Streets on both sides (in both directions) are called Passeig del Rengle. They are streets with online parking spots. Plenty of space, few cars, and if you park on the side of the trees there is shade.

Right in front there is a viewpoint in which there is also a fountain and a free public bathroom with water and soap to wash hands (or not very large dishes).
There is also a playground beyond and a park for exercises such as bicycles and others, especially for the elderly.

At night it's quiet, during the day some people walk by (not many) and cars pass or park but there aren't many or bother.

title: (08170) Montornès del Vallès - 6 Polígon P.I.Can Buscarons de B
title_short: (08170) Montornès del Vallès - 6 Polígon P.I.Can Buscarons de B
description: Large car park, ideal for spending 1 night. not too much noise, no lighting and no one came to see us. Possibility of access to large vehicles.

title: (08479) Barcelona - BV-5119
description: Ideal place to visit the park and make routes to the turo home and agudes. It has Wc not very clean and source

name: Camping
title: (08188) Camping
description: Camping "El Vedado" in greenery with a bus that takes you to Barcelona and return simple and fast.

name: Camping BARCELONA
title: (08304) Camping BARCELONA
description: Camping Barcelona offers all the services of a top-of-the-range campsite. Private shuttle from the campsite to the center of Mataro (Barcelona) seven days a week. Ticket service for all the tourist attractions in the city. Camping Barcelona is located on the shores of the Mediterranean, with a magnificent view of the sea. Activities for adults and the swimming pool are practiced throughout the season. Most plots are very shaded and range from 60 to 140 square meters and are ideal for caravans of all sizes, even 15 meter American caravans. All plots have free high quality Wi-Fi, 10-16 amp electrical connection and almost all have a water point with drain. The entire campsite is suitable for people with reduced mobility. The bungalow park offers a range of very comfortable, fully equipped accommodation with free Wi-Fi.

title: (08415) Bigues i Riells - 55 Urbanització Bigas Castellmo
title_short: (08415) Bigues i Riells - 55 Urbanització Bigas Castellmo
description: Parking area from 09:00 to 22:00.

title: (08340) Vilassar de Mar - 1 Carrer Marina
description: A quiet open space where the neighbors park, large, and quite safe, much quieter and safer than those on the beach. It has nothing, not even a container to throw away the garbage.

name: AREA CAMPER BARCELONA BEACH
title: (08349) AREA CAMPER BARCELONA BEACH
description: BARCELONA BEACH CAMPER AREA - New area for motorhomes in Cabrera de Mar, 10 minutes on foot from the train station to Barcelona (trains every 10 minutes, journey time 40 minutes) and 490 meters from the beach and a shopping centre. Located in a privileged environment, it offers all the services: minimarket, cafeteria, picnic area, gray and black water emptying, water filling, washing machine, dryer and hot water shower. Possibility of only changing water for non-customers. Between the sea and the mountains, from the area you can get to Barcelona by bike (60 minutes) along the promenade, next to the beach, and you can practice water sports, hiking, mountain biking and guided visits to archaeological sites.

title: (08470) Sant Celoni - 178 Urbanització Cal Batlle
description: Along a little frequented path, at the top of a climb, a small site for one or two motorhomes. Quiet, almost flat.

title: (08340) Vilassar de Mar - 203 Avinguda de l'Arquitecte Eduard Ferrés
title_short: (08340) Vilassar de Mar - 203 Avinguda de l'Arquitecte Eduard Ferrés
description: Large earthen car park, relatively flat, next to the swimming pool, shops at 500m, beach at 700m, very good

title: (08416) Bigues i Riells - 8 Carrer Doctor Zamenhof
title_short: (08416) Bigues i Riells - 8 Carrer Doctor Zamenhof
description: Almost flat dirt parking on the outskirts of town, discreet and quiet

name: Masia Can Cervera
title: (08469) Masia Can Cervera
description:
Mountain campsite in the heart of Montseny. Camping in a natural setting with large lawns or wooded areas. With pool and barbecue area.

DIRECTIONS:
Ignore GPS navigators. It guides you on the shortest route, but not on the route in the best condition. The GPS directs you to kilometer point 14 (Bv-5301) and takes you right through the town of Montseny on a bad road. This is impossible with a caravan and much more difficult with a vehicle. You will find the detour to the campsite directly at kilometer point 15 (Bv-5301) on the right-hand side. From here you have to follow a 2 km path (almost entirely paved) until you reach the campsite.

title: (08470) Sant Celoni - Urbanitzacio de Cal Battle
title_short: (08470) Sant Celoni - Urbanitzacio de Cal Battle
description: watch out for bad roads and get very slippery when it rains

title: (08416) Riells del fai - 2P Avinguda Sant Vicenç
title_short: (08416) Riells del fai - 2P Avinguda Sant Vicenç
description: Riells del Fai. Parking without shade for the weekend. Near the Gorgs (natural pools) of the village river. There are several pools. A nice walk, Dogs allowed. Free You can take a dip you have to walk 15 minutes.

title: (08189) Sant Quirze Safaja - Unnamed Road
description: In the middle of nature, at the end of a path. Very quiet and spacious site. Terrain with a little incline. We arrive from Sant Miquel del Fai by track, in good condition.

no facilities available.

title_short: (08340) Vilassar de Mar - 71 Cases de Camp
description: Space for motorhomes and campers on a private property in Vilassar de Mar, without services, with the door open, come in and ask, Jaume/James or Estela will appear at some point or be during the day from 10 a.m. to 8 p.m. in the afternoon. €10 per night. From 8:30 pm to 8:30 am closed for vehicles without prior notice. How to get there: from the side of the sea towards the mountains, NOT from the side of the mountains, (follow the orange triangle, until the hipica) all the way to the right.

description: Parking for cars or vans. We spent the night here And super quiet, a small but very cozy town one block away there is a park with a fountain, the truth is we slept very well, although in other areas of the town there is more and less frequented

title: (08329) Teià - 2 Camí del Cementiri
description: Parking to park and spend the night, with views.

title: (08479) Barcelona - Carretera del Turó de l'Home
title_short: (08479) Barcelona - Carretera del Turó de l'Home
description: Beautiful corner in the woods, at the foot of the road, before reaching the Turó de l'Home car park where you can only park from 8am to 8pm. Two camper vans are sure to fit. 1 AC, I find it difficult because there is like a small rsmoit / mound to park in the grove. NEW NOTE. In the middle of the morning a man came and told me that you couldn't park here. I asked him if he was a park authority and he said yes. I told him to identify himself and he laughed. He told me to leave or they would come and fine me. I told him that I was not going to go, that I was not camping and that I would call park information. I called park information, told them where I was and they told me that if there was no prohibition sign, I could park without problems. It is true that after a while the Mossos d'Escuadra passed just ahead and told me absolutely nothing.

title: (08358) Arenys de Munt - 5 C-61
description: Larger gravel parking lot with no height limit and relatively flat overall. The street next door can be heard too clearly. Day and night camping is allowed at this location according to local police.

title: (08358) Arenys de Munt - 69 Carrer Batlle Trias
title_short: (08358) Arenys de Munt - 69 Carrer Batlle Trias

description:
Parking lot. Dirty but in front of houses. 
High restricted to 2.5m.

description: Large and flat esplanade. It is a detour from the main road. You can spend the night without problem during day and night. Near a route to visit the turo de l'home. No services

title: (08474) Gualba - 141 Diseminado Afueras

title: (08358) Arenys de Munt - Unnamed Road
description: It is next to the road, it is not very level, but there is shade and no one bothers you. It is not for camping, but to rest for a while, yes.

title: (08184) Palau-solità i Plegamans -
description: A quiet place where only walkers pass. ONLY SUITABLE FOR VANS. ⚠️DIRT ROAD⚠️

title: (08100) Mollet del Vallès - 6 Avinguda de Rivoli
title_short: (08100) Mollet del Vallès - 6 Avinguda de Rivoli
description: Parking only during the day next to the Mollet soccer field. At the entrance there is a sign prohibiting parking from 11pm to 8am. It is located on the outskirts of the town, easy access. Ideal for a stopover or to spend the day. At the end of the parking lot there is a skatepark. There are garbage containers next to the entrance to the parking lot. The car park is surrounded by green areas, ideal for walking the dog. Behind the soccer field there is a pedestrian bridge that crosses the highway and leads to walking paths between the cultivated fields. At the access to the car park there are two concrete blocks that make the passage narrow. Vans fit but be careful.

title: (08184) Palau-solità i Plegamans - 42 Carrer de Manresa
title_short: (08184) Palau-solità i Plegamans - 42 Carrer de Manresa
description: Parking area in an undeveloped residential area. There are several streets where you can park without any buildings around. There are some fields, nature and nearby some houses. A quiet place to spend the night on the outskirts of town. Pay attention to the street where you park. Most are fortnightly parking, so depending on the day of the month you park on one side or the other of the street.

title: (08100) Mollet del Vallès - 30 Avinguda dels Rabassaires
title_short: (08100) Mollet del Vallès - 30 Avinguda dels Rabassaires
description: Quiet but not isolated area with plenty of parking and safe since it is mc donals, burguer king etc. 10 minutes walk from the center of mollet with all the comforts that this brings and with the possibility of shade, decathlon wiffi

title: (08479) - Carretera del Turó de l'Home

title_short: (08329) Teià - 40 Avinguda J Roca Suarez L
description: Large car park day and night near a library at the entrance to the city. (Prohibition sign for vehicles over 3.5 tonnes) We slept quietly there (5 campers)
